column4: ugh, my friend managed to forget their username for their fresh fiesty install, but APPARENTLY they remember the password, is there any way they could salvage their system without a reinstall? (it's a fresh system so i don't suppose it'd be too bad)
did they create a new user during the installation
i think so, but he sorta said he wasn't sure
that doesn't work does it? i just tried that myself in a tty
